long_description: The sensible REI Campware Divided plate keeps your favorite foods separate while dining in the backcountry. Made from lightweight, BPA-free polypropylene plastic. Top surface is divided into 3 sections-a large section for a main entree and 2 smaller sections for side dishes. Deep-dish shape helps prevent pesky spills that occur while eating sans table. Hand wash the REI Campware Divided plate in warm water with a mild dishwashing detergent.
short_description: The sensible REI Campware Divided plate keeps your favorite foods separate while dining in the backcountry.
